Name: Accuracy Indicator
Author: Azn9
Description:
Adds a more exact accuracy indicator on the bottom of the screen.
Also displays average accuracy in milliseconds at the end of the level.

Name: Alt Tab Mute
Author: Dom Gintoki
Description: Mutes the game when it's not focused.

Name: AlwaysAprilFool
Author: lxy
Description: Boss always shoot pigeon and tutorial is always april fool's, activate good tek hidden

Name: AlwaysBadApple
Author: lxy
Description: A mod which changes the background and character etc into black and white in tohou scene

Name: AlwaysPigeons
Author: lxy
Description: Boss always shoot pigeon, do not use AlwaysAprilFool at the same time

Name: BestCombinationSuggest
Author: brooke_zb
Description:
Displays the best character combination for a level in the pause screen.
The character combo displayed is usually correct, but don't put your blind faith in it.
When in doubt, refer to CharacterScoreboard.

Name: BPMDisplay
Author: lxy
Description: A mod which displays the BPM info above level designer on preparation screen

Name: CharacterRandomizer
Author: lxy
Description: Everytime you play a chart, a random character combination will be selected.

Name: CharacterScoreboard
Author: Creepler13
Description:
Displays which character a specific score was achieved with on the leaderboard. (OCS)
It can also display your own local scores. (LCS)

Name: ChartReview
Author: lxy
Description:
Automatically selects sleepwalker, sets offset to 0, sets fever to manual, disables certain UI elements.
Can be toggled on/off while in-game.

Name: ChineseMode
Author: RobotLucca
Description: Censores certain aspects of the game. (Characters, illustrations, etc)

Name: Cinema
Author: AshtonMemer
Description: The mod that allows you to see video backgrounds in custom charts.

Name: CustomAlbums
Author: Mo10 & RobotLucca
Description: The mod that allows you to load in custom charts.

Name: CustomBGBrightness
Author: lxy
Description: Allows you to adjust background brightness lower than 40%

Name: CustomHitSound
Author: lxy
Description: Allows you to make custom hit sound. Detailed instructions on github readme

Name: CustomLoadingScreens
Author: Creepler13
Description:
Allows you to add custom loading screens (CustomLoadingScreens folder)
Also allows you to add custom loading screen messages (UserData/CustomLoadingScreens.cfg)
Messages can be paired with an image, or be left as random.

Name: FavGirl
Author: RobotLucca
Description:
Allows you to favorite characters and elfins.
This will make you look like that character even if another character is selected.
You will have the abilities of the selected character & your plays will be submitted as such.

Name: FC AP indicator
Author: lxy
Description: Tells you whether you're on All Perfect/Full Combo pace, and displays the number of misses/greats.

Name: FeverEffectDisable
Author: lxy
Description: Disables the fever background effect (duh.)

Name: Headquarters
Author: AshtonMemer
Description: Allows you to submit scores on custom charts obtained from the MDMC website.

Name: HiddenQoL
Author: RobotLucca
Description:
Adds a button to always show hidden difficulties.
E.g. you don't need to spam click and such to unlock them before playing

Name: IntroSkip
Author: RobotLucca
Description: Skips the "PeroPero HasuHasu" and the opening scene.

Name: MDRPC
Author: Brasileiro
Description: Muse Dash Rich Presence, which is exactly what it says it is.

Name: ModManager
Author: Creepler13
Description: Allows you to disable & delete mods while in-game.

Name: Muse Dash Mirror
Author: lxy
Description:
A library that makes it easier to access PlayerData, BattleComponents info and create UI elements.
This mod does nothing by itself.

Name: MuseDashModTools
Author: lxy & "BÃ¡lint" as balls
Description: Automatically detects and logs available mod updates.

Name: NoAutoPause
Author: AshtonMemer
Description: Prevents the game from automatically pausing when the game loses focus.

Name: QuickRestart
Author: AshtonMemer
Description:
Allows you to use Delete to instantly leave a chart & Allows you to use Backspace to instantly restart a chart
Update now allows you to set custom keybinds.

Name: QuickSwitchCombination
Author: lxy
Description:
Allows you to set keybinds to quickly change your characters.
Now has an in-game menu to add keybinds

Name: SceneEggs
Author: RobotLucca
Description: Makes it possible for customs to use certain background decorations that the default charts use.

Name: ScrollSpeed
Author: RobotLucca
Description:
Allows charters (not players) to set custom scroll speeds.
It's completely up to you whether you wanna use this, most charters don't use it though.

Name: Song Desc
Author: lxy
Description: Displays the title, artist, and difficulty of the song in the top-right corner during play.

Name: StricterJudge
Author: lxy
Description:
A mod which changes the judgement window and make the game harder
You can manually change the judgement range in Stricter Judge.cfg

Name: UI Disable
Author: lxy
Description: Allows you to disable certain visual aspects of the game (example: hit circles)

Name: UltraInstinctSleepwalking
Author: RobotLucca
Description: Makes Sleepwalker Rin do mashers at max speed instead of the normal slow speed.

Name: UnlockAll2
Author: RobotLucca
Description:
An alternative to UnlockAll.
Master's stay unlocked only for as long as the mod is installed.

Name: VictoryScreenSwitcher
Author: Ultra_Rabbit
Description: Allows you to switch victory screen in the settings menu either to DjMax or Arknights. Swaps original screen with arknights/djmax and vise versa.
